data.content: 📷 This week's @ESA_EO #EarthFromSpace is an @CopernicusEU #Sentinel1 image showing the impact of severe flooding following heavy rain in Australia’s Northern Territory in March 2024. https://t.co/5uVKOGf70j

🆕 Astronomers using the NASA/ESA @HUBBLE_space Telescope have discovered that a blowtorch-like jet from a supermassive black hole causes stellar eruptions along its trajectory. https://t.co/68pxrj3PWv

data.content: In nearly 70 years of spaceflight, around 10 000 satellites and rocket parts have reentered Earth's atmosphere. Yet for such an event, we still lack a clear view on what actually happens to a satellite during its fiery last moments. https://t.co/1YHfYpxvAY
